data.description:
Speak Spanish, English, Japanese in VR!

Conquer your fear of speaking through simulated interactions with virtual amigos in 360 video encounters.

On-Demand immersive lessons with enthusiastic teachers! Use speech recognition to improve your pronunciation and progress through the interactions.

Build your speaking confidence in realistic scenarios, which simulate the emotions and nerves of speaking a foreign language.

Discover the culture, history, and language in immersive, interactive videos in Trips around the UK, Spain, and Japan.

Explore Trips and feel like youâ€™re on holiday, soaking up the sights and sounds of another country!

Immerse yourself in guided tours around breathtaking sites.

Subscription-based app with demo.

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS AND ABOVE

changelog.change_log:
- Discover Japan's Past - A society shaped by Samurai, Emperors, Nature, and War - 4.5 hour VR documentary
- Changes to UI
- Speech recognition changes
- Various bug fixes

Huge update to Japanese Lessons:
- More Free Demo Content available
- Reward Trips to Japan added
- Added Conversation Quiz Questions
- Speech recognition improvements - TTS added
- More Videos section added with "How to Learn" and "Behind the Scenes"
- Various UI improvements (more tooltips), video corrections, and bug fixes

Huge update to Japanese Lessons:
- More Free Demo Content available
- Reward Trips to Japan added
- Added Conversation Quiz Questions
- Speech recognition improvements - TTS added
- More Videos section added with "How to Learn" and "Behind the Scenes"
- Various UI improvements (more tooltips), video corrections, and bug fixes

HOTFIX - Japanese speech recognition continuous error FIXED
New features and content coming soon. Join Discord and tell us what you'd like to see different.

-JAPANESE LESSONS are live! We're so proud of this new content.
-Learn Japanese in VR in this 40 lesson series.
-Conversations with locals in Japan.
-Learn alongside Katie with two enthusiastic teachers, Anne and Yuka.
-Also HUGE database update so many more parameters can be altered in real time.
-A LOT more updates are coming in 2024 including Trips to Japan, + more to Spain and Britain.

- User Reports - you can now report bugs or speech rec issues from the playback menu during video playback on all content.
- User Ratings & Feedback - you can now give feedback/ratings on each 360 experience.
- Resume your last experience - you can now quit the app and resume where you last left off from any Spanish or British Trip.
- User Analytics
- NEW Trailers - these exciting videos help you understand what we're offering in our different playlists
- User Experience Upgrades - Playlist thumbnail page with the 5 playlists (the 2 Japanese playlists are coming shortly)

- 45 UK Trips added
- Installation error caused by Quest update FIXED
- Improved backend
